---
title: "ESG Project"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
esg <- read_csv("../data/esg_data_2025.csv")

ggplot(esg, aes(x = reorder(Symbol, Total_ESG), y = Total_ESG)) +
  geom_col(fill = "forestgreen") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Total ESG Scores (2025)",
    x = "Company",
    y = "ESG Score"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
